reviewText: From reading the back cover of the movie, I thought this was going to be a story of a woman trying to get over an old lover with a new found love.  But instate I was disappointmented.  There was plenty of sex scenes which I  thought could have been more passionate if there was more of a developing  relationship between the Haley and Alex.  The acting was horric.  There was  no real story line.  They met and they had sex.  Even the sex scenes lacked  any sensuality.  I could have rented a porn.  Defeinitely NOT recommended
Title: Goodbye Emma Jo VHS

reviewText: This could have been an interesting movie if the characters were more developed and three-dimensional. Dialogue between the two female leads seemed strained at times. The emphasis was on the sex scenes. So if you're  looking for a no-brainer filled with hot, erotic female-female sex, you'll  love this movie. If you're looking for something with more of a storyline  and developed female characters, check out "The Incredibly True  Adventures of Two Girls In Love".
Title: Goodbye Emma Jo VHS

reviewText: On the negative side, the introductory scenes of this video were kind of weepy and "soap-opera-ish", and that defining moment when our two  female protagonists recognize their mutual physical attraction for one  another wasn't overly imaginative.  What set this video apart, however, was  the sex!  Very steamy and erotic!  I especially liked the part where the  blonde rolls her newfound lover onto her stomach and proceeds to kiss her  way down to her pretty posterior, clearly savoring every curvy inch!  That  was yummy!  I enjoy sexual encounters filmed with sensuality and  creativity, and this one certainly fit the bill!
summary: The woman-to-woman eroticism was clearly evident!
Title: Goodbye Emma Jo VHS

reviewText: If most movies are books, this was a short story.  While too short for the money, I found the story delightful and the acting very satisfactory.  I often tire of movies quickly, so I didn't find the short length objectionable, but many might.  I found the erotic scenes just that--erotic without being pornographic.  The story was well played out, the acting good and smooth.  Altogethter, this a very satisfactory, though very short film, with acting at a much better level than some lesbian flicks I've seen lately.
Title: Goodbye Emma Jo VHS

reviewText: I hope my first time with a woman is as enjoyable for me as in this film depiction of young lovers. Buy it.  You won't be sorry.  This is better than buying explicit pornography which degrades women.
